param.name: showresultson
param.label: Show Results on
param.query: select id,`name` from #__menu where link like '%com_locator%' and published=1 order by `name`
param.description: What page should the results be displayed on? This *must* be a menu type of Locator

param.name: tags
param.label: Tags
param.description: Tags to include on the legend. Leave all unselected for All. If your target menu item is filtered to display tags you show here, they will never return results.

param.name: showlegend
param.label: Show a legend?
param.description: Show map icons and labels

param.name: linklegend
param.label: Hyperlink legend Entries?
param.description: Link the entries in the legend to a search by tag for that legend entry. Search results appear on the menu item selected below.

param.name: showzipform
param.label: Show postal code search form?
param.description: Show postal code search form

param.name: showkeywordform
param.label: Show keyword search form?
param.description: Show keyword code search form

param.name: showtagdropdown
param.label: Show drop-down list of tags?
param.description: Show drop-down list of tags

param.name: showcitydropdown
param.label: Show drop-down list of cities?
param.description: Show drop-down list of cities

param.name: showstatedropdown
param.label: Show drop-down list of states/provinces?
param.description: Show drop-down list of states/provinces

param.name: showcountrydropdown
param.label: Show drop-down list of countries?
param.description: Show drop-down list of countries? If enabled, this will be a required field

param.name: requirepostalcode
param.label: Require a postal code?
param.description: Prevents users from pressing Submit and displaying all records

param.name: distance_unit
param.label: Measure in KM or Miles
param.description: When searching for locations near a postal code, use Kilometres or Miles

param.name: distances
param.label: List of distances
param.description: A comma-separated list of values to show in the drop-down box that indicates the search radius.

param.name: showmap
param.label: Show a map?
param.description: Show a small map

param.name: centeronresults
param.label: Center Map on results?
param.description: Automatically zooms and pans the search results map display to best fit the search results.

param.name: gmap_default_lat
param.label: Map Center Latitude
param.description: The center latitude of the map. This can be overridden by the Menu item parameters.

param.name: gmap_default_lng
param.label: Map Center Longitude
param.description: The center Longitude of the map. This can be overridden by the Menu item parameters.

param.name: gmap_default_zoom
param.label: Map Zoom
param.description: The default zoom level of the map (1-10). This can be overridden by the Menu item parameters.

param.name: gmap_base_tld
param.label: Google Maps Base TLD
param.description: The two-letter country code top-level domain used to bias the geocoder's results. See http://www.iana.org/domains/root/db/index.html

param.name: defaultmapview
param.label: Default Map View
param.description: Sets the default type of Google Map display

param.name: gmap_width
param.label: Map Width
param.description: Map width in pixels (E.g: 500). This can be overridden by the Menu item parameters.

param.name: gmap_height
param.label: Map Height
param.description: Map height in pixels (E.g: 500). This can be overridden by the Menu item parameters.
